Author: chubbyUsagi
Text: Def, Everytime I finish my plate my bf goes "wow baby you were hungry!" In my head I'm like yeah I was now I feel like a cow and I'm gonna think about this for a week.  When I'm genuinely not hungry he accuses me of starving myself and gets genuinely upset, so I eat, so I don't hurt him.   I'm content with a salad but he's a bigger boy and likes eating shitty food. Scary foods.   My mom keeps telling me "don't let him get you fat!" In my last relationship I gained about 60 pounds, since I found my current bf I lost it all and rebirthed my disordered eating and habits.
